thread.section_title: Goway Travel Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Goway Travel | goway.com
thread.title: Ronda Adams
thread.title_full: Goway Travel reviewed by Ronda Adams

author: Ronda Adams
title: Ronda Adams
text:
We booked thru Goway to Tahiti last year and then again this past month to the Galapagos Islands. Both trips we BEYOND our expectations. They made our trips an amazing experience with suggesting and booking based on what we asked for (you don't always get that!) and making sure we have someone at each leg of our journeys there to help us get where we needed to be and even when flights changed the transport reps were amazing!!
We would highly recommend Goway to everyone for ANY travel your booking! And we will definitely use them again for our next adventure!
Ronda Adams
